net.proteusframework.core.mail.support

Interface Loader


  • public interface Loader
    Implementers provide the ability to load data for a MessageTemplate. This class can be used to load data in an application defined way, such as from a database or generate data dynamically.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStream load(java.lang.String name)
      Load the specified resource.

      Save the specified data.

      • save

        void save(java.lang.String name,
        java.io.InputStream data)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Save the specified data.
        Parameters:
        name - the name (reference) of the data.
        data - the data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is unsupported.
